name: Elliot Schumacher
body:
I am a Masters Student at the [Language Technologies Institute](http://www.lti.cs.cmu.edu/), [School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/), working with Maxine Eskenazi.  My research focus on Natural Language Processing for Education.  Before attending CMU, I received a B.S. in Computer Science and Linguistics from Ohio State University.

Here is my cv.
